com.objetdirect.tatami.client
Class DojoController

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.DojoController

public class DojoController
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a sungleton and permits to control some Dojo features. It controls the loading of the scripts JavaScript those are necessaries for the Dojo widgets, ie avoids to load several times the same scripts. It permits also to link or unlink the dojo widget with the GWT widget and finally permits to scedule a creation of the Dojo widget to avoit some memory leak.

Author:
Vianney

Returns the instance of the singleton DojoController

Returns:

require

public boolean require(java.lang.String widgetDojo)
Loads the scripts Javascripts for the DOJO widget.

Parameters:
widgetDojo - the package to import in the browser for the DOJO widget.
Returns:
true if the loading of the script was necessary, false if the script was already loaded.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the param widgetDojo is not a package for the version of Dojo.

destroy

public void destroy(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject dojoWidget)
Destroy the Dojo widget.

Parameters:
dojoWidget - the DOJO widget to destroy.

loadDojoWidget

public void loadDojoWidget(HasDojo widget)
Loads if it is necessary the scripts JavaScript DOJO for a component implementing the interface Hasdojo. This method calls also HasDojo#onDojoLoad() if the scripts was loaded.

Parameters:
widget - the widget implementing HasDojo interface.

destroyDojoWidget

public void destroyDojoWidget(HasDojo widget,
                              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget gwtWidget)
Removes a link between a GWT widget and a DOJO widget. The DOJO widget will be also removed from the GWT widget.

Parameters:
widget - the widget containing the DOJO widget.
gwtWidget - the gwt widget linked with the DOJO widget.
